properties.name: camel.component.web3j.address
properties.description: Contract address.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.addresses
properties.description: Contract address or a list of addresses.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.at-block
properties.description: The block number, or the string latest for the last mined block or pending, earliest for not yet mined transactions.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.block-hash
properties.description: Hash of the block where this transaction was in.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.client-id
properties.description: A random hexadecimal(32 bytes) ID identifying the client.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.configuration
properties.description: Default configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.web3j.Web3jConfiguration type.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.data
properties.description: The compiled code of a contract OR the hash of the invoked method signature and encoded parameters.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.database-name
properties.description: The local database name.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the web3j component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.filter-id
properties.description: The filter id to use. The option is a java.math.BigInteger type.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.from-address
properties.description: The address the transaction is send from

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.from-block
properties.description: The block number, or the string latest for the last mined block or pending, earliest for not yet mined transactions.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.full-transaction-objects
properties.description: If true it returns the full transaction objects, if false only the hashes of the transactions.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.gas-limit
properties.description: The maximum gas allowed in this block. The option is a java.math.BigInteger type.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.gas-price
properties.description: Gas price used for each paid gas. The option is a java.math.BigInteger type.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.hashrate
properties.description: A hexadecimal string representation (32 bytes) of the hash rate.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.header-pow-hash
properties.description: The header's pow-hash (256 bits) used for submitting a proof-of-work solution.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.index
properties.description: The transactions/uncle index position in the block. The option is a java.math.BigInteger type.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.key-name
properties.description: The key name in the database.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.mix-digest
properties.description: The mix digest (256 bits) used for submitting a proof-of-work solution.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.nonce
properties.description: The nonce found (64 bits) used for submitting a proof-of-work solution.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.operation
properties.description: Operation to use.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.position
properties.description: The transaction index position withing a block. The option is a java.math.BigInteger type.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.priority
properties.description: The priority of a whisper message. The option is a java.math.BigInteger type.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.private-for
properties.description: A transaction privateFor nodes with public keys in a Quorum network

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.quorum-a-p-i
properties.description: If true, this will support Quorum API.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.sha3-hash-of-data-to-sign
properties.description: Message to sign by calculating an Ethereum specific signature.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.signed-transaction-data
properties.description: The signed transaction data for a new message call transaction or a contract creation for signed transactions.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.source-code
properties.description: The source code to compile.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.to-address
properties.description: The address the transaction is directed to.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.to-block
properties.description: The block number, or the string latest for the last mined block or pending, earliest for not yet mined transactions.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.topics
properties.description: Topics are order-dependent. Each topic can also be a list of topics. Specify multiple topics separated by comma.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.transaction-hash
properties.description: The information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.ttl
properties.description: The time to live in seconds of a whisper message. The option is a java.math.BigInteger type.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.value
properties.description: The value sent within a transaction. The option is a java.math.BigInteger type.

properties.name: camel.component.web3j.web3j
properties.description: The preconfigured Web3j object. The option is a org.web3j.protocol.Web3j type.
